column3:
Hmm... we never have deployed #5916 (I guess you did in your custom distribution?). This would mean 104ab313baeac2f909ce1fb10fe8562327b35e01 would address a feature-compatibility between third party distribution.
Okay for me but results in some ugly migration code.

My preferred solution would be:
- a) 104ab313baeac2f909ce1fb10fe8562327b35e01 must only be included in your custom distribution (

I called it "OLD" rather than "8BIT" because there's a bitshift involved.

Any idea what's up with Travis's Mac build? :/
I'd prefer to not include migration code for something that we never deployed.\nYou can include that in your own distribution, of course.\n
